About Me

Find out more about me and what I've done

Who Am I?

I am a graduate of the Higher Diploma in Computer Science from the South East Technological Institute Waterford with over 7 years experience in Full-Stack Web, Database and Business Intelligence (BI) Development. As part of the course, I did an internship which I did with the Walton Institute in Waterford. After the internship, I was kept on for a further 18 months working as a Full Stack JavaScript Developer. I also worked as an SQL developer with SE2 to complement my 2 years experience in developing web applications using Node.js and Angular.js. I am now a Developer working with Dawn Meats.

What did I do before?

Many moons ago, I used to work in the Financial Services field. Although I thought it was fine, I've always wanted to do programming and web development. I've always liked computers and used them for a long time. Then the opportunity to do a full-time ICT Skills Springboard course became available. It really appealed to me. Instead of having to go back and do a four year degree, I could get the qualification in just 18 months along with invaluable experience from a six month internship.
